name: Corpdaq
long_description: We’re building Stripe of Lending for Asian Businesses. Corpdaq is a lending platform that connects Businesses with Banks & Investors in South East Asia. We use LLM’s to automatically  assess their business and creditworthiness. We launched 4 months ago, we already have $36,000 of monthly revenue, and we’re growing 85% every month. We’re both second-time founders from Indonesia. Hendra was previously CEO and Co-founder of Payfazz, a billion-dollar fintech and payments company in Indonesia. Inas was previously CTO and Co-founder of Rulo, an exited enterprise fintech software, and Verihubs, the largest verification and credit scoring startup in Indonesia.
